t: LIST OF AMAZON BRANDS - WIKIPEDIA
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: AMAZON ADS AND THE DIGITAL MARKETS ACT (DMA) | AMAZON ADS
s: January 31, 2024 - The Digital Markets Act (DMA) is a regulation in the European Union (E.U.) that introduces a range of obligations and comes into effect from March 6. In September 2023, Amazon was designated as a “gatekeeper.” Since designation, Amazon Ads has been working constructively with the European ...
